Document.TEXT:
This is a good, How To Video. Where Ben Heck, tries to fix a 1970's Atari Video Music Effects System. It was made, to produce Efx on your TV. From the Audio input, coming from a Music - Stereo System. Check out the related videos and the rest of the Ben Heck Show, on Elemen14.com, http://www.element14.com/community/docs/DOC-43657/l/the-ben-heck-show-archived-episodes?ICID=benheck-episodes-videodoc... Don  Ben Heck's Atari Video Music Teardown
Video link... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=INnpnJvDXDg The Ben Heck Show Published on Jan 15, 2016 In this episode Ben takes a stab at repairing an old piece of 70's technology, The Atari Video Music.
